name: Super NES Oddysey
description:
A small version of Super Mario Oddysey recreated using Flash Player, In a 8Bit theme.
Controls:

A = Z (may have to press multiple times)
B = X

Enter = Pause

Space = Map

Press Up arrow key near a person to talk to them.

Press ESC to exit full screen.

Before you ask, Yes, I uploaded this to Scratch also. I thought I would put it on Itch.io as it was kinda good.

:D
